programme.title: Bring On The Karbs
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 Bar Food Done Good
programme.desc: Chefs Erica and Josh Karbelnik go head-to-head to see who can come up with the most tantalizing bar bites! Josh makes fried halloumi, whitefish tartar, and a salad based on a drink, while Erica prepares beef tartare, escargot, and sliders!

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: We've all cooked with salt. But what about ON salt. That's right, chef Spencer Watts blows our minds with his seared scallops that are cooked on a Himalayan pink salt block. His next recipe uses a quick cure with Hawaiian black lava salt on swordfish steaks, then tops them with a gorgeous and refreshing grilled fruit salsa. Then, Spencer gets creative with Cured Duck Legs with Scallions, using a salt cure to intensify the flavours of duck leg before it's cooked slow and low, then glazed with maple and soy. After cooking on salt, curing with salt, the only thing left is to cook INSIDE salt - Spencer's Salt Crusted Prime Rib is a game changer, flavourful, bone-in beef that he seasons with a...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Chocolate on the barbecue? That's right. Chef Spencer Watts kicks off this episode as he grills a crispy coconut-cacao crust and serves it with sweet chili dipping sauce. Chocolate is the not-so-secret ingredient in Spencer's Grilled Chicken Molé. He grills the chicken legs smothered in the sweet-spicy-salty-nutty-creamy-chocolatey sauce, then finishes it by cooking it slow and low. Next, dark chocolate cocoa powder is in both the rub and the sauce for Chef Watts' favourite pork rib recipe - Cocoa-rubbed Baby Back Ribs. For his final recipe, Spencer takes it to a sweet level with his Chocolate pizza made with chocolate ganache, grilled cherries, with barbeque- caramelized white chocolate...

programme.title: The Wizard Of Sauce
programme.desc: Chef Kyle Crawford pulls back the curtain on creamy sauces! First a duo of creamy butter sauces with salmon! Next up a sauce créme with beef tenderloin and a vegan coconut créme anglaise!

programme.title: The Wizard Of Sauce
programme.desc: Chef Kyle Crawford pulls back the curtain on savoury sauces! First up, a soy-miso-honey sauce for seared duck breast! Next, a black demi-glace for hanger steak and a sauce duxelles for scallops!

programme.title: The Wizard Of Sauce
programme.desc: Chef Kyle Crawford pulls back the curtain on spicy sauces! First up, a Cajun comeback sauce for soft-shelled crab! Next, a classic steakhouse mustard sauce and a ginger caramel sauce for ginger caramel apples!

programme.title: The Wizard Of Sauce
programme.desc: Chef Kyle Crawford pulls back the curtain on wine sauces! First up, a classic veal marsala! Next, a white wine chicken gravy and a port sabayon with grapes!

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S02 : E17 Japanese food inspired by other cultures
programme.desc: Chef and culinary instructor Hana Etsuko Dethlefsen shows us Japanese cuisine inspired by other cultures with a pork and tofu dish, sesame chicken salad, breaded pork cutlet, and even a French crepe.

programme.title: Up the Dish
programme.desc: Take a trip around the world in this episode of Up the Dish! Host Missy Hui hits the Great Wall running - her Chinese Fried Rice recipe is a classic complete with crispy bacon, crunchy onions and savoury scallions. Then, Poppy Sandler sets off for the Land of the Rising Sun with Crispy Sushi Rice and Spicy Tuna; sriracha mayo seasons the sushi-grade tuna and sticky short-grain rice cakes are fried (fried rice anyone?) to a beautiful golden-brown. Micah Trainor's Gorgonzola-Chive Arancini puts a Sicilian spin on frying rice - panko-crusted arborio is creamy and flavourful with blue cheese and chives for this ultra-indulgent Italian redux. Rice Papad with Turkey Tikka Masala is Tiera...

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Noodles are the star ingredients when chef Hana Etsuko Dethlefsen cooks up somen noodles with dipping sauce, ramen salad, a fried noodle dish, and a one-pot delight.

programme.title: Up the Dish
programme.desc: Get ready for a not-so-raw deal in this episode of Up the Dish! Host Poppy Sandler sets things in motion and slices up a simple, elegant Sashimi with tangy Ponzu and tart Wasabi Mayo on the side. Missy Hui gets carnivorous with Lamb Carpaccio and Dukkah - delicate raw lamb and a Middle Eastern-style dip served with some delicious pita! But wait, what's a vegetarian to do with all this meat? Tiera Singh's got the answer - island-style Poke Bowls, with fruit instead of fish. Refreshing watermelon is marinated in a savoury, soy-based sauce and served with rice. For the finale, Micah Trainor Up('s) the Dish with her Scallop Tartare and Beet Chips, combining raw scallops with ultra-decadent...

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Host Hana Etsuko Dethlefsen showcases how easy it is to incorporate Japanese flavours into everyday meals.

programme.title: The Wizard of Whatever
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Chicken, Tempura, Frittata, and Ragu
programme.desc: Chef Kyle Crawford unveils four spellbinding dishes! First up, Indian-inspired Goan chicken! Next, classic tempura! Followed by Tunisian-style frittata! Finishing with veal ragu!

programme.title: Zach Kinda Cooks
programme.desc: Lazy and curmudgeonly chef and ex-Gusto writer Zach cooks one of his all-time favorite meals – Roast Chicken Dinner! While cooking, he tells aimless stories, cracks bad jokes, and berates Sydney, the beleaguered camera person.

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Charming host Chef Michael Bonacini explores the mountainous region of Basilicata with a feast fit for any celebration. Beginning with an antipasto that caters to the region's southern heat, Michael stuffs crunchy sweet peppers with ripe tomatoes, savoury anchovies, and fresh oregano. Moving on to the primo, Michael cooks up a creamy Vermicelli Frittata. Using leftover pasta, he combines eggs with cheese, anchovies, and chili flakes for extra flavour to make a classic Basilicata dish. Michael cooks up Pollo Alla Potentina, a traditional meal from the Feast of Saint Gerard. This hearty chicken stew is sure to heat up your core, using hot peppers as the base of the meal. For his final dish,...

programme.title: Bring On The Karbs
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 Bar Food Done Good
programme.desc: Chefs Erica and Josh Karbelnik go head-to-head to see who can come up with the most tantalizing bar bites! Josh makes fried halloumi, whitefish tartar, and a salad based on a drink, while Erica prepares beef tartare, escargot, and sliders!

programme.title: Generation Cooks
programme.desc: Aspiring kid Chefs make avocado toast and tacos, Liam whips up an easy pantry pasta, while Jae-Anthony and his father Wendell make a favorite one pot meal!

programme.title: Zach Kinda Cooks
programme.desc: Lazy and curmudgeonly chef and ex-Gusto writer Zach cooks one of his all-time favorite dishes – Mexican Lasagna! While cooking, he tells aimless stories, cracks bad jokes, and berates Sydney, the beleaguered camera person.

programme.title: Spice Secrets
programme.desc: Every cook needs to learn their Mother Sauces before they can claim the title of Chef. Spice Secrets co-hosts Shahir Massoud and Jasmin Ibrahim are no different, though their sauce recipes sure are! First, a traditional Tomato Sauce re-examined as a Bucatini All'Amatriciana spiced with Quatre Épices! Next, a rich veal Demi-Glace spiced two different ways, served with veal chops and Roasted Mushrooms! Finally, a spin on a classic Béarnaise Sauce, replacing tarragon with Aniseed.

programme.title: Let's Brunch
programme.desc: Inspired by flaky, buttery, and chocolatey dishes, host Vanessa cooks up four classic French recipes that'll have you saying oh la la!

programme.title: Gusto's QR Countdown
programme.desc: Unlock Gusto TV's top recipes on QR Countdown! Thousands of viewers scan our QR codes to access our delicious dishes. Now, we're serving up 8 of our most popular fruit recipes, from hosts like Spencer Watts and Kimberly Lallouz.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 The Art of Wood
programme.desc: It's time to celebrate the art of smoking with wood! You'll drool over Spencer's Cherrywood Smoked Chicken Wings, dry rubbed with his favourite spices and smoked with cherrywood. Next, Spencer marinates sable fish in Japanese ingredients and grills it on a sweet-smoky cedar plank. Then, Spencer shows off his Texas BBQ skills with his Mesquite Smoked Skirt Steak. Engulfed in a thick cloud of white smoke, this skirt steak has the flavour and texture of tasty brisket, but made in a fraction amount of time. Finally, Spencer gives a pork shoulder a long, smoky cook in oak wood. The wait is worth it as he serves it piled high on a bun and topped with a mustardy Carolina BBQ sauce.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 A Barbeque Classic: Ribs
programme.desc: Grill master Spencer Watts shows us four ways to barbeque a classic. Succulent, tender, mouth-watering ribs.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Barbecuing bananas, that's crazy. Chef Spencer Watts shows us how to grill the delicate, evERS-scrumptious fruit. Bananas.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Fish on the Grill
programme.desc: Fish. Flaky, flavoursome, and perfect for barbeque. High energy host Spencer Watts tests out his grill with delightfully tender fish dishes.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S02 : E17 Japanese food inspired by other cultures
programme.desc: Chef and culinary instructor Hana Etsuko Dethlefsen shows us Japanese cuisine inspired by other cultures with a pork and tofu dish, sesame chicken salad, breaded pork cutlet, and even a French crepe.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Chicken, Tempura, Frittata, and Ragu

programme.title: Flour Power
programme.desc: Host Jessica McGovern bakes up some delightful Italian classics including a crumbly Cherry-pistachio Biscotti.

programme.title: Flour Power
programme.desc: Talented baker Jessica McGovern shows us how to get fancy with three stunning French desserts.

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Chef Michael Bonacini highlights the tiny region of Molise, exposing some of its best kept savoury secrets. Starting with a classic, Michael cooks up a delicious multi-layered Chicory Timbale, a pie filled with fresh chicory, ripe roma tomatoes, and sliced prosciutto. To crisp up the top of the pie, Michael tops his delicious dish with finely grated pecorino cheese and crunchy breadcrumbs. Next up, Michael's primo is a spicy Octopus in Purgatory. This tender, colourful, and sumptuous dish is sure to impress in both looks and taste! For his secondo, Michael cooks up a traditional Marinated Rabbit. Stewed in wine, tomatoes, and chilies, this rustic dish will have your guests asking for...

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Delving into the cold mountainous region of Valle D'Aosta, Celebrity chef Michael Bonacini whips up a meal of four hearty dishes that are sure to warm up any chilly day. programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: The popular region of Tuscany is known for its wines, cheeses, and gorgeous sights. Chef Michael Bonacini introduces us to Tuscany's fine cuisine with four of his favourite dishes. Michael draws attention to the importance of mushrooms in Tuscan culture with an antipasto: Many Mushroom soup. Warm, hearty, and full of earthy flavour, Michael tops this soup with fried sage leaves to combine comfort and crunch in a single bite. For his primo, Michael explores a Tuscan favourite - Lamb Ragu! Served over pici noodles, Michael's rich ragu is complemented by fresh, light herbs. Then, Michael serves up a Porchetta-Style Duck, a crispy and tender secondo. To bring his meal together, Michael ends...

Host Missy Hui hits the Great Wall running - her Chinese Fried Rice recipe is a classic complete with crispy bacon, crunchy onions and savoury scallions. Then, Poppy Sandler sets off for the Land of the Rising Sun with Crispy Sushi Rice and Spicy Tuna; sriracha mayo seasons the sushi-grade tuna and sticky short-grain rice cakes are fried (fried rice anyone?) to a beautiful golden-brown. Micah Trainor's Gorgonzola-Chive Arancini puts a Sicilian spin on frying rice - panko-crusted arborio is creamy and flavourful with blue cheese and chives for this ultra-indulgent Italian redux. programme.title: Up the Dish
programme.desc: Get ready for a not-so-raw deal in this episode of Up the Dish! Missy Hui gets carnivorous with Lamb Carpaccio and Dukkah - delicate raw lamb and a Middle Eastern-style dip served with some delicious pita! But wait, what's a vegetarian to do with all this meat? Tiera Singh's got the answer - island-style Poke Bowls, with fruit instead of fish. Refreshing watermelon is marinated in a savoury, soy-based sauce and served with rice. programme.title: Let's Brunch
programme.desc: Champagne, lobster, and homemade scones, oh my! Host Vanessa Gianfrancesco cooks up an indulgent and luxurious brunch that's perfect for those fabulous mid-mornings.

programme.title: Let's Brunch
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Pick Up Your Brunch
programme.desc: Skip the utensils and gather for chef Vanessa's pick up your brunch! Featuring Sticky Pull-Apart Praline Bread and an extra cheesy Monte Cristo Sandwich.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: First stop on Chef Spencer's Spanish flavour tour? Habanero Char-Grilled Octopus - warmed up with punchy chilies and balanced with a sweet and tangy sherry vinaigrette. Next, Spencer stuffs whole sea bass with citrus and herbs, gives it the grill treatment and then tops it with olive oil blistered cherry tomatoes. The rotisserie does the heavy lifting for Mr. Watts' whole roast chicken - spiked with bright Spanish flavours like Spanish chilies and smoked paprika, slow cooked and served extra juicy. Finally, Spencer prepares a classic Spanish recipe: Paella. Loaded saffron rice, piled high with chorizo, veggies, and shellfish. Of course, Spencer's Paella is made in the Spanish tradition;...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 The Butter Did It
programme.desc: It's all about beautiful butter in this episode of Watts on the Grill! First up, entertaining host Spencer fires tosses clams in velvety butter, zesty garlic and earthy spices to make his Clams with Garlic Paprika Butter. Next up is a traditional Indian recipe, but done on the grill - Butter Chicken! All the butter chicken flavours we love are infused in the marinade, before getting crisped up on the fiery grill - the result is both classic and completely new! Scallops are next, grilled and served with a mouth-watering caper-raisin butter. For his final recipe; Chef Watts prepares a rich and juicy grilled Rib Steak topped with a decadent port wine compound butter. Oh, what a butter-loving...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: We've all cooked with salt. But what about ON salt. That's right, chef Spencer Watts blows our minds with his seared scallops that are cooked on a Himalayan pink salt block. His next recipe uses a quick cure with Hawaiian black lava salt on swordfish steaks, then tops them with a gorgeous and refreshing grilled fruit salsa. Then, Spencer gets creative with Cured Duck Legs with Scallions, using a salt cure to intensify the flavours of duck leg before it's cooked slow and low, then glazed with maple and soy. After cooking on salt, curing with salt, the only thing left is to cook INSIDE salt - Spencer's Salt Crusted Prime Rib is a game changer, flavourful, bone-in beef that he seasons with a...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Chocolate on the barbecue? That's right. Chef Spencer Watts kicks off this episode as he grills a crispy coconut-cacao crust and serves it with sweet chili dipping sauce. Chocolate is the not-so-secret ingredient in Spencer's Grilled Chicken Molé. He grills the chicken legs smothered in the sweet-spicy-salty-nutty-creamy-chocolatey sauce, then finishes it by cooking it slow and low. Next, dark chocolate cocoa powder is in both the rub and the sauce for Chef Watts' favourite pork rib recipe - Cocoa-rubbed Baby Back Ribs. For his final recipe, Spencer takes it to a sweet level with his Chocolate pizza made with chocolate ganache, grilled cherries, with barbeque- caramelized white chocolate...

programme.title: Spice Secrets

Spice Secrets co-hosts Shahir Massoud and Jasmin Ibrahim are no different, though their sauce recipes sure are! First, a traditional Tomato Sauce re-examined as a Bucatini All'Amatriciana spiced with Quatre Épices! Next, a rich veal Demi-Glace spiced two different ways, served with veal chops and Roasted Mushrooms! Finally, a spin on a classic Béarnaise Sauce, replacing tarragon with Aniseed.

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: From hearty inland crops to fresh food of the sea, the Venetian region covers it all. Host Michael Bonacini begins with the sea as he serves up an antipasto of succulent Soft Shell Crab. Michael pairs the crab with a Tangy Aioli made from sundried tomatoes, creating the perfect combination of crispy and creamy. Moving inland for his primo, Michael twists together two classic Venetian dishes to make a new favourite: Radicchio Risotto! With his secondo, Michael cooks up a light and creamy Pancetta-Wrapper Snapper with Pea Mash. Sweet and tender, this dish will melt in your mouth. Whether you're in the mood to share or feeling a little selfish, Michael's Giant Almond Crumb Biscuit covers it...

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: Bihar’s rural heartland has a lot to offer the intrepid traveller. Alex meets Rajesh Ramjan, a politician, a cultural conservationist and a foodie, who shows her the beauty of Bihar’s countryside and introduces her to some traditional Bihari dishes. From dahi-chura, the Bihari breakfast of champions to flavourful preparations of fresh local vegetables simmering on a traditional stove, Alex gets an understanding of the nourishing cuisine that fuels farmers to toil in the fields all day.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 City Breaks Brussels, Belgium
programme.desc: Six hundred years ago, Brussels was just a nice place to stop and buy a waffle on the way to France. Exploring the capital of Belgium today, Catriona realizes that it’s a city where the historic Grand Palace and a hip museum of the world’s oldest and latest cars co-exist. It’s the city where the quirkiness of Mannekin-Pis meets the futuristic approach seen in the Atomium. It’s the city where traditional Belgian chocolates can be savored after a visit to the multicultural Mini Europe park.

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: Considered among the oldest communities in India, the Gaud Saraswat Brahmans have a culture and cuisine that is still largely unexplored. Eisha sets out to explore the lesser-known flavours of this cuisine with the renowned chef, Sudip Pai, who introduces her to some of the culinary gems of his community. While she cooks with him, she also comes to know about the beliefs and traditions that govern the cuisine and way of life of the community.

She goes on to visit the Castra Rubra winery, where she finds out about the history of Viticulture in Bulgaria and the process of wine making.

programme.desc: For the people of Sofia, preserving its heritage is sacrosanct, and this can be seen in the way the city's infrastructure is built around its archeological treasures. Catriona realizes this when she roams around the cobblestone streets of the city. With every monument she visits, she finds herself transported to a different era, right from Perperikon fort, which narrate stories of the Byzantine empire, to Boyana church, which is home to some of the earliest examples of medieval artwork.

On a visit to Paro, Radhika explores famous monasteries such as the Rinpung Dzong and Takstang Monastery, and learns the history and legends associated with them. Along the way, she finds out the secrets to the quintessential Bhutanese peace and contentment.

Here, she checks out significant sights such as the Tibetan-style National Memorial Chorten, the National Library and the Folk Heritage Museum in order to understand more about the beliefs, history, architecture and cuisine of Bhutan.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: Known as Druk Yul or the “Land of the Thunder Dragon”, Bhutan is the country of mountains, monasteries and mystery. Radhika Bangia finds this to be true when she visits Punakha, the former capital of Bhutan, where she marvels at the architecture of Punakha Dzong and gets to know the story behind the two rivers, Mo Chhu and Po Chhu. She also explores the sacred temples and Mebar Tsho lake of Bumthang, the religious heart of Bhutan, and gets to know the local legends.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: Robbie’s journey to reconnect with his Scottish roots begins in Edinburgh, the stunning capital city perched on extinct volcanoes. Navigating the twists of the Royal Mile, strutting around the majestic Edinburgh castle and learning to sip scotch like a true Scotsman, he feels a tad closer to his heritage. The real fun kicks in, however, when he stumbles onto a rather flamboyant way to unleash his inner Highlander.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.desc: Like Rome, Plovdiv straddles seven hills; but as Europe’s oldest continuously inhabited city, it’s far more ancient. As Catriona takes a tour of the city to see its iconic attractions such as a Roman Amphitheatre, which was once the setting for gladiator fights, and the striking Baroque Saints Constantine and Helena Church, she begins to see how seamlessly modern life blends with the age-old ruins. Along the way, she realizes why Plovdiv is called the ‘Eternal City’ of Bulgaria.

programme.desc: Visit Belgrade, with Heather as she explores the city, its architecture and learns about its past by visiting historical monuments.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: Robbie’s adventures in Perth kick off with him immersing himself in the historic grandeur of the Scone Castle, where a mysterious stone tells tales of Scottish monarchs. But the real thunder of the Highlands awaits at the Braemar Games gathering, where tartan meets brawn, and Robbie learns that embracing his Scottish side involves more than just kilts and castles.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E27 Backpack Novi Sad, Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Novi Sad, the financial and industrial hub of Serbia.Starting with canoeing on Danube and later exploring the city and its landmarks.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Boarding Pass Santa Village, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline Nsingi Nkosi goes to Santa Village at Rovaniemi, where she reads some of the letters that children from around the world write to him.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Xplore Bulgaria Sunny Beach
programme.desc: Luxurious hotels, thrilling water parks, inexpensive food and almost 300 days of bright sunny weather make Bulgaria’s biggest seaside resort, Sunny Beach popular for budget beach getaways. Catriona, however, stumbles onto the historic town of Nessebar, which is over 3000 years old, and realizes that there is more to the place than meets the eye. She goes on to visit the Castra Rubra winery, where she finds out about the history of Viticulture in Bulgaria and the process of wine making.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: Benafsha embarks on a whirlwind adventure in Ahmedabad. With just 48 hours in the city, she is determined to make the most of it, but how?

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Food Fact Fun The Hague, Netherlands
programme.desc: From exploring a vintage car museum to scaling a 5 meter ice-wall and sampling a rich bread cookie, Watch Alex exploring The Hague, also known as the “International city of peace”.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: A modern European oil city built on the back of a rich maritime heritage, Aberdeen is the energetic kingpin of northeast Scotland. While the boom times may come and go, the dynamic coastal metropolis never ceases to thrill with its free museums, outdoor adventures and natural attractions right on the city’s doorstep.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Požarevac and visits the ancient town of Viminacium. Later visits National Museum, concluding with Majdanpek’s Rajkova Pecina Caves.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Boarding Pass Rovaniemi, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline Nsingi Nkosi goes to Rovaniemi, where she visits a husky farm and finds out about about breeding and raising huskies.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.desc: For the people of Sofia, preserving its heritage is sacrosanct, and this can be seen in the way the city's infrastructure is built around its archeological treasures. Catriona realizes this when she roams around the cobblestone streets of the city. With every monument she visits, she finds herself transported to a different era, right from Perperikon fort, which narrate stories of the Byzantine empire, to Boyana church, which is home to some of the earliest examples of medieval artwork.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Great World Hotels, Four Seasons 1(Eng)
programme.desc: From lazing in hammocks by the beach to sipping drinks on a private yacht, Kim realizes that Maldives is the perfect destination to unwind in style.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Food Fact Fun Rotterdam, Netherlands
programme.desc: From trying dishes like Stroopwafel and Palat Stoofvlees to visiting the Erasmus bridge, cube houses and wall painting on the streets, Alex explores Rotterdam.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: Since medieval times Aberdeenshire and its northwestern neighbour Moray have been the richest and most fertile regions of the Highlands. Aberdeenshire is famed for its Aberdeen Angus beef cattle, its many fine castles and the prosperous 'granite city' of Aberdeen.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: Explore Majdanpek with our host as the city brings the viewers closer to the treasures strewn across the Serbian countryside.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Boarding Pass Levi, Finland
programme.desc: Levi is Finland's largest and fastest-growing ski destination. Emeline is here, to find out the exciting activities that Levi offers, in summer.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: With snow-capped peaks rising over primeval forests and traditional villages, Paro is like an Oriental Switzerland. On a visit to Paro, Radhika explores famous monasteries such as the Rinpung Dzong and Takstang Monastery, and learns the history and legends associated with them. Along the way, she finds out the secrets to the quintessential Bhutanese peace and contentment.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Great World Hotels, Four Seasons 2(Eng)
programme.desc: An invigorating spa treatment, a cooking lesson, a snorkeling session – Kim has experiences in the Maldives that leave her completely rejuvenated.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E14 Food Fact Fun Utrecht, Netherlands
programme.desc: From trying Orange zest beer and traditional Dutch dishes to exploring St.Martin's Cathedral, Dom Tower and enjoying go karting and stand up paddle boat ride, watch Alex enjoy his trip in Utrecht.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: In the enchanting landscapes of Inverness, Robbie’s journey takes a whimsical turn: from eccentric to downright magical.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Nis,one of the oldest cities in Europe.She visits a concentration camp and later paraglides to end by watching a musical performance.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Boarding Pass Ruka Kuusamo, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline goes to Ruka-Kuusamo, where she tries river rafting. She also meets a reindeer herder,who tells her about the unique ways of herding reindeer.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: Actress and travel enthusiast, Radhika Bangia explores the enigma that is Bhutan, when she visits Thimpu, the capital city with no traffic lights and no skyscrapers invading the skyline. Here, she checks out significant sights such as the Tibetan-style National Memorial Chorten, the National Library and the Folk Heritage Museum in order to understand more about the beliefs, history, architecture and cuisine of Bhutan.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 World Heritage Ancient Temples of Egypt, Egypt (ENG)
programme.desc: Explore the ancient heritage sites of Abu Simbel, the Philae complex of Nubia and the Hatshepsut Temple to unravel the mystical stories behind the ancient temples of Egypt.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 Food Fact Fun Gouda, Netherlands
programme.desc: Alex tries traditional Dutch food in Leiden, learns about Dutch history at Prinsenhof Museum, visits a Gothic church, a local cheese market and Delftware factory at Gouda.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 10 Days Scotland Isle Of Skye (ENG)
programme.desc: The grand finale of Robbie’s wild homecoming unfolds amidst the rugged beauty of the Isle of Skye.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E31 Backpack Resavsk Pecina, Serbia
programme.desc: Continue exploring Serbia with Heather as she visits the Manasija monastery, Resavska caves, ending with a joyride onboard Eight of Sargan rail line.

programme.title: With Love From Mauritius
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 With Love From Mauritius Ep 1
programme.desc: Krisann and Nathan’s vacation in Mauritius begins in Le Morne, where an unexpected adventure awaits the latter.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: Known as Druk Yul or the “Land of the Thunder Dragon”, Bhutan is the country of mountains, monasteries and mystery. Radhika Bangia finds this to be true when she visits Punakha, the former capital of Bhutan, where she marvels at the architecture of Punakha Dzong and gets to know the story behind the two rivers, Mo Chhu and Po Chhu. She also explores the sacred temples and Mebar Tsho lake of Bumthang, the religious heart of Bhutan, and gets to know the local legends.

programme.title: World Spas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 World Spas Kempenki, Jordan (ENG)
programme.desc: Jamie Srubis tries out spa treatments, which are inspired by the Dead Sea and the desert surroundings at Hotel Kempinski Ishtar in Jordan.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Food Fact Fun Dubai 1
programme.desc: After Burj Khalifa, Alex has a traditional Emirati platter, visits the gold market and skiing rink, and goes for a camel safari and camping.

programme.title: City break

programme.desc: Nestled in the mighty Alps, tour the Austrian city of Innsbruck with Sabrina and explore a town that’s alpine-urban yet traditional in nature.

programme.title: Chasing Dreams -Episode 5
programme.desc: A thrilling journey through Chasing Dreams, where every trail becomes a battleground for victory. From the peaks of the Basque Country to the routes of Chamonix, witness the determination of trail runners as they chase their dreams on the Golden Trail World Series.

programme.title: Chasing Dreams -Episode 6
programme.desc: A thrilling journey through Chasing Dreams, where every trail becomes a battleground for victory. From the peaks of the Basque Country to the routes of Chamonix, witness the determination of trail runners as they chase their dreams on the Golden Trail World Series.

programme.title: Chasing Dreams -Episode 7
programme.desc: A thrilling journey through Chasing Dreams, where every trail becomes a battleground for victory. From the peaks of the Basque Country to the routes of Chamonix, witness the determination of trail runners as they chase their dreams on the Golden Trail World Series.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2020 - #4 Austria
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Freeride World Tour 2020 "Live Summary"
programme.desc: The fourth part of the FWT 2020 will take place in Austria. The Freeride World Tour is a worldwide competition of freeride snowboarding and skiing, where the best riders in the world compete against each other.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #37: Freestyle Pro Tour 2025 - Paros (GRE)
programme.desc: The Freestyle Pro Tour 2025 stops off at the beautiful island of Paros in Greece. Crystal clear water, steady meltemi winds, and the breathtaking backdrop of the Aegean Sea set the stage for the world's best freestyle windsurfers.

programme.title: Simple Session 2024 - Highlight Show Skate
programme.desc: Simple Session was born in 2000, starting as a small-town competition, it has now blossomed into one of the world's largest and most prestigious BMX and skateboarding contests. Simple Session 24 is set on August 24-25, promising a spectacular festival!

programme.title: MIT100 - Triathlon Mauritius
programme.desc: The "MIT100 - Mauritius International Triathlon" is a prestigious annual triathlon event held in Mauritius. It attracts athletes from around the world, offering a challenging course with a 1.8 km swim, a 55 km bike ride, and a 12 km run.

programme.title: Motosurf World Championship 2024
programme.desc: MotoSurf World Championship in Croatia: This year, when the championship hosted the qualification for the World Games as part of the Championship, 109 racers representing 21 different countries and 3 continents competed in Zadar.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2020 - #3 Andorra
programme.desc: The third part of the FWT 2020 will take place in Andorra. The Freeride World Tour is a worldwide competition of freeride snowboarding and skiing, where the best riders in the world compete against each other.

programme.title: South African Surf Session - Dungeons (RSA)
programme.desc: Big wave surfing is a discipline in which experienced surfers paddle into orare towed onto waves which are at least 20 feet (6.2 m) high. There are only a few placeson the globe with famous big waves and Dungeons in South Africa is one of them.

programme.title: Dolomites SkyRace 2017 - Canazei/TRentino (ITA)
programme.desc: This summer, the Italian mountain region of Trentino is once again the place to be for the international skyrunnning elite. Thanks to its diverse landscape with scenic mountains, Trentino is the ideal host for a skyrunnning race.

programme.title: Come Prepared - Dangerous Dungeons - Cape Town (RSA)
programme.desc: There are just a handful waves all over the planet that are the perfect setting for Big Wave Surfing. And Dungeons is one of them. It´s a thunderous, right-breaking wave, located at Hout Bay, Cape Town, South Africa.

programme.title: Far Away
programme.desc: Matthias Haunholder and Matthias Mayr present a big mountain freeski film, primarily shot in Austria. Through stunning ski footage and heartfelt interviews, the film explores the intense emotions of parents and loved ones as they cope with the risks faced by the skiers.

programme.title: E-Bike World Tour 2024
programme.desc: The Verbier E-Bike Festival, held in Verbier, Switzerland, from August 14-18, 2024, is Europe's premier e-mountain biking event, attracting thousands of participants and spectators. In its sixth edition, the festival features a diverse range of activities.

programme.title: Motosurf World Championship 2024
programme.desc: MotoSurf World Championship in Croatia: This year, when the championship hosted the qualification for the World Games as part of the Championship, 109 racers representing 21 different countries and 3 continents competed in Zadar.

programme.title: Desert Dash Namibia 2024
programme.desc: The Desert Dash 2024 is an exhilarating mountain biking event that challenges riders to conquer the breathtaking terrain of the Namib Desert. Spanning over 24 hours, participants embark on a grueling 369-kilometer journey.

programme.title: Simple Session 2024 - Skate Final
programme.desc: Simple Session was born in 2000, starting as a small-town competition, it has now blossomed into one of the world's largest and most prestigious BMX and skateboarding contests. Simple Session 24 is set on August 24-25, promising a spectacular festival!

programme.title: WOF 2023 #28: ITF Beach Tennis World Tour 2023 - Brasilia Classic 2023 (BRA)
programme.desc: Nach einem spannenden Mai, in dem die Sand Series Gran Canaria Classic und die Beach Tennis World Championships in zwei aufeinanderfolgenden Wochen stattfanden, reisen die Spielerinnen nach Brasilien zur dritten Ausgabe der Sand Series Brasilia Classic.

programme.title: WOF 2023 #29: European Freestyle Pro Tour - Vieste (ITA)
programme.desc: In der heutigen Folge besuchen wir die European Freestyle Pro Tour 2023 im italienischen Vieste. Die Windsurfer werden ihr Können auf dem Wasser zeigen und uns ein wenig Wassersport-Action auf dem Mittelmeer bieten.

programme.title: WOF 2023 #30: WES E-Bike World Series #1 & #2
programme.desc: In der heutigen Folge werfen wir einen Blick auf die erste und zweite Runde der World E-Bike Series 2023 in Monaco und Bologna, Italien. Aber wer kann die Rennen der Männer und Frauen gewinnen? Lasst es uns herausfinden!

programme.title: WOF 2023 #31: European Freestyle Pro Tour 2023 - Mid Season Recap
programme.desc: Die ersten Events der European Freestyle Pro Tour 2023 sind vorbei und wir werfen einen Blick zurück auf die besten Windsurfer der Welt und ihre epischen Tricks auf dem Wasser.

programme.title: Mammut Athlete Profile Dani Arnold - The Art of Iceclimbing
programme.desc: Daniel Arnold was born in 1984 in the Swiss canton of Uri and grew up in the small mountain village of Biel in the heart of the Swiss Alps. Dani and his brother experience all aspects of mountain life: hiking, skiing and climbing in some of the toughest climbing locations in the world

programme.title: Open Faces 2025 - FWQ Challenger Silvretta Montafon - Live delayed Part 1
programme.desc: For the first time, Silvretta Montafon will be part of the Freeride World Tour Challenger Series, making it a crucial contest for the world's best qualifier riders who want to qualify for the Freeride World Tour 2026.

programme.title: WOF 2024 #16: Absa Cape Epic 2024 - Best of MEN
programme.desc: The ABSA Cape Epic is the world’s premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year, leading aspiring amateur and professional mountain bikers from around the world through 648 Untamed kilometres of unspoilt scenery and up 15 475m of climbing.

programme.title: Loic and the Flolopapys
programme.desc: Loic, Pierre,Pabloand Florian are climbers. Together they form the inseparable “Flolopapys” but can Loic use the Flolopapys energy to overcome his haunting fear of heights as he confronts some of the toughest climbs on the planet?

programme.title: WES - World E-Bike Series, UCI E-Mountainbike World Cup Cross Country, Race 3 & 4 - Germany
programme.desc: Welcome to WES rounds 3 and 4 of the UCI E-Mountainbike Cross-Country World Cup presented by Schwalbe. We are in Bielstein, Germany, for the second year in a row and the Bielstein Forest Course is the venue for this event and one of Europe's oldest motocross circuits.

programme.title: WOF 2024 #17: Swatch Nines 2023 - Pedal To The Metal
programme.desc: Experience 24 minutes of adrenaline-fueled feats as Nicholi Rogatkin (USA) and Casey Brown (CAN) take viewers through the final highlight edit of the 2023 Swatch Nines Mountain Bike event at Germany's Green Hill Bikepark, held from the 14th to the 19th of August.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2020 - #3 Andorra
programme.desc: The third part of the FWT 2020 will take place in Andorra. The Freeride World Tour is a worldwide competition of freeride snowboarding and skiing, where the best riders in the world compete against each other.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #37: Freestyle Pro Tour 2025 - Paros (GRE)
programme.desc: The Freestyle Pro Tour 2025 stops off at the beautiful island of Paros in Greece. Crystal clear water, steady meltemi winds, and the breathtaking backdrop of the Aegean Sea set the stage for the world's best freestyle windsurfers.

programme.title: WOF 2024 #45: Freestyle Pro Tour 2024
programme.desc: Welcome to World of Freesports and the Freestyle Pro Tour 2024! Get ready to witness the world’s best freestylers perform jaw-dropping tricks and intense competition on the water. Let the battle for the title begin - it’s time for freestyle action!

programme.title: WOF 2024 #37: GKA Kitesurf Worldtour Sylt Highlights
programme.desc: GKA Kitesurf Worldtour Sylt Highlights - Sylt (GER)Welcome to World of Freesports and the beautiful beaches of Sylt, the most northern part of Germany, where the Big Air Riders of the GKA are off for a battle. Let´s check out this spectaculare water event!

programme.title: FIA World Championship – Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge - Prologue Day
programme.desc: The FIA World Championship - Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge 2025 is an exciting motorsport event in the breathtaking desert of the United Arab Emirates. A must for all fans of first-class off-road racing.

programme.title: Tortour 2017 (SUI) & Mountain Festival (ESP)
programme.desc: The incredible landscapes of the Parc National D'Aigüestortes i Estany de Sant Maurici as well as the magical settings of La Vall de Boí have been the chosen venue for the celebration, of the first edition of BUFF® MOUNTAIN VALL DE BOI FESTIVAL.

programme.title: Transmaurienne Vanoise - MTB Stage Race (FRA)
programme.desc: The world's biggest cycling area hosts one of the most beautiful mountain bike races in the world, and of course it's right here in the French Alps, in the Haute Maurienne/Vanoise region. It is the incredible Transmaurienne 2017!

programme.title: Ötztaler Radmarathon - Cycle Marathon - Sölden (AUT)
programme.desc: 4 steep Alpine passes, 238 kilometres in distance, and 5,500 metres in altitude: on August 27, 2017, nearly 5,000 competitors from all over the world will tackle the Oetztaler Radmarathon at Soelden, Tirol, Austria.

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 - Sal (CPV)
programme.desc: Cape Verde hosts the GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024, bringing together the world’s best kite-surfers. Athletes from around the globe compete for the title, showcasing impressive skills in wave-riding and strapless freestyle.

programme.title: Visit Qatar GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024 - Fuwairit (QAT)
programme.desc: Fuwairit Beach is the venue for the Visit Qatar GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024, where the world's best freestyle kiteboarders put their skills to the test. With constant wind, this hotspot in Qatar offers the perfect conditions for the competitions.

programme.title: GWA Wingfoil World Cup - Sal (CPV)
programme.desc: Sal is the venue for the GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024, where the best wingfoilers in the world will meet for an exciting competition. This paradise in Cape Verde is known for its strong winds and rolling Atlantic waves.

programme.title: Copa Kitely GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024 - Ibiraquera (BRA)
programme.desc: Ibiraquera is the venue for the GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024, where the world's best wingfoilers will meet. With its constant winds and breathtaking coastline, this Brazilian hotspot provides the perfect backdrop for exciting races.

programme.title: Open Faces 2025 - FWQ Challenger Silvretta Montafon - Live delayed Part 1
programme.desc: For the first time, Silvretta Montafon will be part of the Freeride World Tour Challenger Series, making it a crucial contest for the world's best qualifier riders who want to qualify for the Freeride World Tour 2026.

programme.title: Roc d’Azur 2024
programme.desc: With the aim of bringing cycling to as many people as possible in France, CIC has become a title partner of the Roc d'Azur, Europe's leading mountain bike event, which attracts almost 100,000 enthusiasts, participants and aficionados every year!

programme.title: E-Bike World Tour 2024
programme.desc: The Verbier E-Bike Festival, held in Verbier, Switzerland, from August 14-18, 2024, is Europe's premier e-mountain biking event, attracting thousands of participants and spectators. In its sixth edition, the festival features a diverse range of activities.

programme.title: WES - World E-Bike Series, UCI E-Mountainbike World Cup Cross Country, Race 3 & 4 - Germany
programme.desc: Welcome to WES rounds 3 and 4 of the UCI E-Mountainbike Cross-Country World Cup presented by Schwalbe. We are in Bielstein, Germany, for the second year in a row and the Bielstein Forest Course is the venue for this event and one of Europe's oldest motocross circuits.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2020 - #4 Austria
programme.desc: The third part of the FWT 2020 will take place in Austria. The Freeride World Tour is a worldwide competition of freeride snowboarding and skiing, where the best riders in the world compete against each other.

programme.title: Winter Games 2017 - Freeride Ski & Snowboard - New Zealand
programme.desc: Stunning scenery, world’s best talent and Kiwi hospitality is set to be showcased to a global audience with Winter Games New Zealand revealing its most diverse event yet. Winter Olympic, Paralympic and X Games stars are heading to New Zealand once again.

programme.title: Acro Games - Paragliding Aerobatics - Organya (ESP) & Rock Master Festival - Bouldering - Arco (ITA)
programme.desc: Organya is a very special place for this kind of flying and enables the pilots to basically do these tricks. They climb up and go down and that´s why it is called the magic mountain.

programme.title: Coupe Aéronautique Gordon Bennett - Fribourg (SUI) & World Paragliding Championships - Monte Avena (ITA)
programme.desc: 61st Gordon Bennett Cup & FAI 15th Paragliding World Championship

programme.title: WOF 2025 #37: Freestyle Pro Tour 2025 - Paros (GRE)
programme.desc: The Freestyle Pro Tour 2025 stops off at the beautiful island of Paros in Greece. Crystal clear water, steady meltemi winds, and the breathtaking backdrop of the Aegean Sea set the stage for the world's best freestyle windsurfers.

programme.title: Copa Kitely GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024 - Jericoacoara (BRA)
programme.desc: The Copa Kitely GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024 will take place in Jericoacoara, where the world's best wingfoilers will compete against each other. With its legendary winds, this Brazilian jewel offers ideal conditions for high-speed racing.

programme.title: Qatar Airways GKA Kite Park League World Championships – Hood River (USA) – Best Of

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E09 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 9 - England
programme.desc: SCL UK has landed in Gloucester it is workout war fitness for the ferocious, it’s going to be a a battle of the brutal, a rampage of the roofless. This is going to be a massacre of the muscles. You know it by now, but just in case you don’t, this is strongman champions league.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E10 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 10 - World's Strongest Viking
programme.desc: On the menu this week it’s medieval madness, we’ve come back to the middle ages to test our noble men through a muscle gaining of events. They are hoping and we are hoping that one will survive to take the title of the world’s strongest Viking. The official World's Strongest Viking is this time in Finland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: This week is a good one, can you feel the energy? Sit still, just look at me and try and feel the energy, because I can tell you, the atmosphere here is electric, it’s explosive, there is a pure elemental force going through these athletes' veins. I’m shaking because it’s Poland, it’s powerful, it’s strongman champions league, and you know what I'm going to say, get ready because it’s about to get heavy.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: SCL Poland part 2 - Who will win the title in Poland and take 25 points for the world ranking. It is very exciting on the top, in part 1 between Poland and Latvia. Another great episode with super strongman events such as: Bag Toss Medley, Log Lift Reps and the Powerstairs. Also an interview with Mateusz Kieloszkowski, the all time favorite champion from Poland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: It’s time to show our strength and gain respect from the gods of Olympus. Our gladiators have many events set out by no other than Hercules himself. The coliseum is ready here on this mythological island of Cyprus, so we have landed in Limassol were again 12 Top Strongmen are battling for the title and ranking points.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E14 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 14 - South Africa
programme.desc: The only and official world championship Truckpulling for its 10th year, again at the Strongman Champions league. With the 3 times Worldchampion Kelvin de Ruiter – defending his title. This championship has trucks in all shapes and sizes which is a lot like our athletes, there all different pay loads, but does the biggest win or is it the strongest.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E15 Stage 15 - SCL World Finals Bosnia
programme.desc: Years and years of determination has brought us here today, when all the walls felt like they were caving in perseverance. When their bodies were screaming, hurting, shouting stop, beneath. These are the things which make up a man, these are the things that bring you world finalists. This episode they fight for the greatest title of all, they fight to put their names in the history books forever.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E16 Stage 16 - SCL World Finals Bosnia
programme.desc: Part 2 of the World Finals of the Strongman Champions League tour 2023 at the Sarajevo Centar Skenderija in Bosnia. 3 Events was done already and amazing results have been set. Who will be the new World champion? Find out here, who, after 16 stages, will be crowned World Champion 2023.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 1, Norway
programme.desc: Across seven rivers, through mountains and forests, 12 strongmen go to toughest places to find out who is strongest Viking in the World and open a new season of Strongman champions league for 2015. Events like the Hercules Hold, Yoke Race and pulling a real Viking ship are some of the ingredients of this fantastic show.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: The second stage of Strongman champions league will be hosted in Germany, by FIBO - the leading international trade show for fitness, wellness and health worldwide with 300,000 visitors in four days. Special implements like the biggest log in the world or the special Bavarian stone lift are not only a challenge, but also an opportunity for new personal, national and world records.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 3, Holland
programme.desc: Holland is hosting 12 different countries with 14 of the strongest men in the world for the third stage of the Strongman Champions League.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 4, Finland
programme.desc: Zydrunas Savickas, one of strongest people on earth is in this competition which has attracted the attention of the audience in the battle for the title of strongest man in Finland. The next round of SCL is in Bulgaria.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 5, Bulgaria
programme.desc: The next stage of the competition is in Bulgaria where Ervin Katona (SCL World Champion 2012) will compete for the last time.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 6, Latvia
programme.desc: Krzysztof Radzikowski, the leader in the league will fight hard to keep Dainis Zageris off from the title and to gather another 25 ranking points in this next stage in Latvia.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 7, Croatia
programme.desc: The competition sees a close battle with a new world record in overhead dumbbell and close finishes throughout the day. This stage is in Croatia, in a city over 1700 years old, steeped in Roman tradition and history, the athletes arrive for the truck pull after a picturesque boat ride on the Adriatic Sea.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 8, Poland
programme.desc: We are now half way through the SCL 2015 and getting closer to the grand world finals in Turkey. The eighth stage is in Poland, the home country of the current leader Krzysztof Radzikowski.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 9, Austria
programme.desc: In this stage we go into the mountains of Austria to find out through six grueling events who is the strongest in the land of Alps. Martin Wildauer, current World Champion 2014 and Austrian local is competing alongside Zageris, Radzikowski, Belsak and many others.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 10, Romania
programme.desc: The 10th stage of this year's competition in Strongman Champions League is held in the Romanian city of Sibiu where the 12 strongmen continue to compete for the title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 11, World Log Lift Championship
programme.desc: The 11th stage is the SCL Log Lift World Championships in Lithuania. In this championship, each competitor must lift three different weights overhead. Zydrunas Savickas is the current world record holder in the Log Lift.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 12, Lithuania
programme.desc: This next episode of the Strongman Champions League is hosted in Lithuania and sees us getting one step closer to the final.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 13, Portugal
programme.desc: The 13th stage of Strongman Champions League is in Maia, Portugal. The competition is at the “Powerexpo” – one of the best sport and fitness events in Portugal.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E14 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 14, Martinique
programme.desc: This stage is in Martinique and eight strongmen from all over the world will compete for the last chance to gather points before the world grand finals in December.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E15 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 15, Lightweight World Championship
programme.desc: A special World championship under the newcomers and lightweights in the Strongman world. Some of them will step from this to the heavyweights divisions.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E16 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 16, World Finals Turkey
programme.desc: After 15 outstanding competitions all over the world, finally we are here at the final competition of this year’s Strongman Champions League hosted in Turkey.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: The second stage of the SCL heads to the FIBO convention, Cologne. The leading international trade show for fitness, wellness and health hosts.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 3, Lithuania - Log lift World championship
programme.desc: For the third stage of SCL world series 2016, the athletes compete in Kaunas for the SCL Log Lift World Championships.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 4, Holland
programme.desc: Stage four is an epic competition and a few surprises. With 14 strongmen from all over the world, one newcomer left quite an impression.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 5, Latvia
programme.desc: This year Lauri Nami joins the starting list, back after last year's injury in Romania

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 6, Serbia
programme.desc: The SCL train stopped in Zlatibor for the stage 6 of the MLO SCL. 11 compete for the title in the home country of legendary Ervin Katona.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 7, Bulgaria
programme.desc: Bulgaria hosts the next stage of the SCL. Current leader in the World Series is Matjaz Belsak, youngest competitor and strongest man of Slovenia.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 8, England
programme.desc: The competitors battle it out in the special event, the Atlas Steel Stone. This stone is made completely from iron and cannot be touched with any support.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 9, Finland
programme.desc: This stage sees the strongmen visit Vaasa, Finland. Residents here are familiar with the competition because some of the SCL icons are from their country.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 10, Finland - World championship under 105 kilograms
programme.desc: 38 athletes compete in the under 90kg and under 105kg SCL World Championships. From each weight class, the top 12 qualify for the finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 11, Romania Part 1
programme.desc: A two day, seven event battle with lots of spectators.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 12, Romania Part 2
programme.desc: Alex Moonen is leading. Part two of the competition in Romania showcases a new challenge - Hercules Hold.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E13 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 13, Curacao
programme.desc: In this stage in Curacao no one wants to lose the chance to fight for one kilo gold in World grand finals in Dubai.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E14 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 14, Portugal
programme.desc: The last chance to qualify for the World Grand Finale. Zageris and Belsak fight for the better position for the finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E15 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 15, Dubai World grand finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: We reach Dubai where we will crown the new champion for SCL 2016. This is part one of the world finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E16 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 16, Dubai World grand finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: In this last episode, the best athletes compete in Pole Push, Deadlift, Forward Hold and Loading.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 1, Norway
programme.desc: We are in beautiful Norway for the kick off of the 2017 MLO Strongman Champions League season. With partly cloudy weather and lots of snow, we have the perfect scenery for the athletes, who prepare for the first contest of the year.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: A definite highlight in this FIBO edition in Germany, Strongman Champions League introduced its new rules for a special team item. Graham Hicks tries here to set a New World Record on the biggest log in the world, currently held by Krzysztof Radzikowski. Boosted also by the presence of the acclaimed in the strongman circles names of Mark Felix and Danis Zageris.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E03 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 3, Lithuania
programme.desc: This weekend sees the Strongman Champions League Log Lift World Championships in Lithuania. Big lifting names such as Graham Hicks , Vidas Blekaitis and Vytatus Lalas are in the startlist to push some big numbers.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 4, Holland
programme.desc: The battle of the Dutch will take place this edition in Lichtenvoorde, a place very well known in Holland because of the famous “Black Cross”. The athletes will compete over six heavy events and the winner gets 25 Strongman Champions League ranking points.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E05 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 5, Serbia
programme.desc: Set in the beautiful mountain resort Zlatibor, the fifth stage of the Strongman Champions League 2017 sees 14 athletes from across the world competing for the gold medal of SCL Serbia 2017. The event welcomes top-athlete - and odds-on favourite - Matjaz Belsak (Slovenia), who has presented himself in an impressive shape so far. Can his opponents defeat him?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 6, Canada (Part 1)
programme.desc: The next two stages take place in Quebec. With eight events over two days, SCL Canada is a true ‘heavyweight’. The athletes compete in: Truck Pull, Deadlift with cars, Log Lift, and the Atlas Stones. The World’s Strongest Viking Jean-Francois Caron from Canada is a favourite, as well as current SCL leader Matjaz Belsak (Slovenia) and promising underdog Jimmy Paquet (Canada).

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E07 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 7, Canada (Part 2)
programme.desc: Welcome to the second day in Quebec. The athletes are fighting hard to win this two-day event. The last points of this SCL stage can be won over four outstanding disciplines: Power Stairs, Dumbbell Press, Keg Toss, and finally, the legendary Farmer’s Walk. Who will leave Canada with the yellow ‘Leader Shirt’?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E08 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 8, Finland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stages 8 and 9 of the SCL are hosted in Vaasa, Finland, taking place over a spectacular two-day event. After 3 wins so far, Matjaz Belsak from Slovenia plans to extend his lead at the top of the table. Among the other 13 highly motivated strongmen, two SCL legends will make their comeback to the competition: Former World Champion of 2015, Krzysztof Radzikowski (Poland) and Dainis Zageris (Latvia).

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E09 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 9, Finland (Part 2)
programme.desc: The fight for the Finnish trophy continues. In this unmissable SCL event, the strongmen battle for the win in the Carry and Drag, the Forward Hold, Deadlifting with Cars and the Loading Race. Belsak, Radzikowski and Zageris look good after the first day, but the others haven’t given up yet.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E10 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 10, Finland Lightweight World Championship
programme.desc: This under 105kg category event is the ultimate preparation for up-and-coming strongman athletes before entering the heavy class. The Lightweight World Championship is a special every year in the SCL calendar as it sees new talents rise and many promising athletes who are gearing up for future tournaments. A total of 25 athletes from 16 different countries make their way to Kokkola, Finland

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E11 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 11, Romania
programme.desc: Situated in the very heart of the Carpathian Mountains, Sibiu is a Romanian town where the climate is pleasantly mild, offering some of the best weather conditions for a strongman event around Europe. All this, without doubt, set the mood for the high results and showtime vibes in Stage 11 of Strongman Champions League. The competition in Sibiu was organized in six different disciplines

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E12 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 12, Curacao
programme.desc: From now on every stage of these series will be more than crucial. Curacao is a beautiful Dutch island in the Caribbean, with a great atmosphere to hold another stage of the MLO Strongman Champions League. Let’s see who takes the title here and who will secure a place in the next stage.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: GLORY 103: Last Heavyweight Standing main event features Levi Rigters (19-3, 9 KO) colliding with Jamal Ben Saddik (38-10, 29 KO) to see who moves on in the tournament. Among the other names taking part in Phase Two are Nabil Khachab (29-6-1, 4 KO), Iancu Ionut (31-11, 13 KO), Rade Opacic (21-7, 16 KO), Milos Cvjeticanin (13-4, 9 KO), Sofian Laidouni (39-5-1, 20 KO), and many more. In addition, Chico Kwasi (44-5-2, 23 KO) will defend his GLORY welterweight world title against Mehdi Ait El Hadj (35-4-2, 8 KO), Mory Kromah (34-3-1, 20 KO) returns and takes on Cristian Ristea (44-26, 13 KO) in a heavyweight match-up outside the tournament, and Tayfun Ozcan (88-11-3, 28 KO) clashes with rival...

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: At the ExCeL Arena in London, England on March 23, 2013. This event featured a super fight between Tyrone Spong and Remy Bonjasky as headliner, this event also featured non-tournament super fight series.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: GLORY makes it's debut in Turkey with GLORY 6: Istanbul. The main event features a super fight between Gokhan Saki against Daniel Ghiță. The event features 14 more fights with the likes of Joseph Valtellini, Filip Verlinden, Nieky Holzken, and Fabiano Cyclone among others.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E07 GLORY 102 Featherweight Grand Prix
programme.desc: Four more will punch their tickets into the next round as GLORY & RISE search for the baddest featherweight on the planet in this year long tournament. On the GLORY side, top ranked German Polish fighter Denis Wosik (40-9-1, 9 KO) takes on Thai veteran Suarek (107-40-11, 39 KO) and Italy’s Achraf Aasila (53-13, 13 KO) meets France’s Lounis Saing (19-4-1, 12 KO). Meanwhile on the RISE side of the bracket, Japan’s Yutaro Asahi (17-9, 4 KO) clashes with Spain’s Eduardo Catalin (17-3-1) and top Japanese prospect Yura Kono (15-1, 7 KO) goes up against China’s Dexiang Kong (35-10). In addition to the Last Featherweight Standing matchups, Shiro Matsumoto (53-17-4, 18 KO) defends his RISE...

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: CJ Hollett is a Brazilian Jiu Jitsu Black Belt who loves teaching his craft. CJ loves working with MMA fighters because of their hunger to win, and believes it's time for Jiu Jitsu to make a resurgence in the MMA cage.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Dean Schmeichel has been coaching for over 20 years. Despite the allure of working as a full time wrestling coach in the martial arts industry, he has instead dedicated himself to work with kids and coaching school sports. Wrestling continues to be an interal part of Dean's life, and he finds the most satisfaction in helping athletes to understand and fall in love with the sport, as he did.

programme.title: Undercover Love
programme.sub-title: S01 : E277 Undercover Love S1 E277
programme.desc: Behind the facade of running an NGO for hearing and speech impaired children, the demure Jagadhatri Sanyal is, in reality, a fiery intelligence officer code-named JAS.

programme.title: Gangaaa
programme.desc: Gangaa, a child widow, faces numerous hardships while living in a community of ultra-conservative people. However, with a blend of charm and bravery, she challenges outdated traditions.

programme.title: Mehek
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.title: Maitree
programme.sub-title: S01 : E31 Maitree: The Rules of Love S1 E31
programme.desc: The lives of three friends, Nandini, Maitree and Ashish get inexplicably intertwined when an accident brings unexpected changes in their lives.

programme.title: King of Hearts
programme.sub-title: S01 : E277 King of Hearts S1 E277
programme.desc: Jamai Raja is an Indian drama series about Siddharth, who marries Roshni to mend her strained relationship with her mother, Durga Devi Patel. The show explores the complexities of family dynamics, love, and duty as Siddharth navigates various challenges to unite his new family.

programme.title: Second Chances
programme.sub-title: S01 : E277 Second Chances S1 E277
programme.desc: Yash, a rich and esteemed business tycoon, yearns for real love. While he falls in love with Neha, the journey ahead is not going to be an easy one for him. Will he be able to win Nehas heart?

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S03 : E71 Jodha Akbar S3 E71
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: This is Fate
programme.sub-title: S01 : E277 This is Fate S1 E277
programme.desc: The story revolves around the two sisters of Pragya, from Kumkum Bhagya. Her sisters are Preeta and Shristhi who discover the existence of their mother Sarla and sister Pragya, after their father’s death. The sisters try to unite with their mother and sister.

programme.title: Trinayani
programme.desc: Trinayani is a woman who can see the future. She decides to use her power to make other peoples lives better. How will things turn out for her when people learn about her extraordinary abilities?

programme.title: Guddan
programme.desc: Guddan, a cheerful yet clumsy young woman, ends up marrying Akshat Jindal aka AJ, a rich businessman with three sons and daughters-in-law. How will Guddan face the challenges that await her?

programme.desc: The story revolves around the two sisters of Pragya, from Kumkum Bhagya. Her sisters are Preeta and Shristhi who discover the existence of their mother Sarla and sister Pragya, after their father’s death. The sisters try to unite with their mother and sister.

programme.title: Trinayani
programme.desc: Trinayani is a woman who can see the future. She decides to use her power to make other peoples lives better. How will things turn out for her when people learn about her extraordinary abilities?

programme.title: Guddan
programme.desc: Guddan, a cheerful yet clumsy young woman, ends up marrying Akshat Jindal aka AJ, a rich businessman with three sons and daughters-in-law. How will Guddan face the challenges that await her?

programme.title: Undercover Love
programme.sub-title: S01 : E279 Undercover Love S1 E279
programme.desc: Behind the facade of running an NGO for hearing and speech impaired children, the demure Jagadhatri Sanyal is, in reality, a fiery intelligence officer code-named JAS.

programme.title: Gangaaa
programme.desc: Gangaa, a child widow, faces numerous hardships while living in a community of ultra-conservative people. However, with a blend of charm and bravery, she challenges outdated traditions.

programme.title: Mehek
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.title: Maitree
programme.sub-title: S01 : E33 Maitree: The Rules of Love S1 E33
programme.desc: The lives of three friends, Nandini, Maitree and Ashish get inexplicably intertwined when an accident brings unexpected changes in their lives.

programme.title: King of Hearts
programme.sub-title: S01 : E279 King of Hearts S1 E279
programme.desc: Jamai Raja is an Indian drama series about Siddharth, who marries Roshni to mend her strained relationship with her mother, Durga Devi Patel. The show explores the complexities of family dynamics, love, and duty as Siddharth navigates various challenges to unite his new family.

programme.title: Second Chances
programme.sub-title: S01 : E279 Second Chances S1 E279
programme.desc: Yash, a rich and esteemed business tycoon, yearns for real love. While he falls in love with Neha, the journey ahead is not going to be an easy one for him. Will he be able to win Nehas heart?

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S03 : E73 Jodha Akbar S3 E73
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.
